metadata.title: USN-4305-1 -- ICU vulnerability
metadata.description: Andr√© Bargull discovered that ICU incorrectly handled certain strings. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4305-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  icu-devtools - 60.2-3ubuntu3.1 libiculx60 - 60.2-3ubuntu3.1 libicu60 - 60.2-3ubuntu3.1 libicu-dev - 60.2-3ubuntu3.1 icu-doc - 60.2-3ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
